info.+content: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K.
La Vida Desastrosa de Saiki K.

Saiki Kusuo, an otherwise normal teenager, has various super-powers, telepathy and telekinesis included. This should have been cool, but through experience, Saiki comes to realize that having powers while trying to lead an ordinary life is a bad mix. (from manga)
#1: "Seishun wa Zankoku janai" (青春は残酷じゃない) by Natsuki Hanae
#2: "Sai Psi Sai Kōchō!" (最Ψ最好調!) by Dempagumi, Inc.
